name: Lemonade
ingredients:
1 cup sugar
1 cup water
1 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice, about 4 to 6 lemons
2 - 3 cups water to dilute
directions:
1. Make a simple syrup of the water and sugar. Combine in a saucepan and bring to a simmer.
2. Stir so sugar dissolves and remove from heat.
3. Pour the juice and syrup into a serving picture. Dilute with cold water to taste.
4. Chill 40 minutes in the fridge.
